FuncDef: This command configures the time interval to wait before declaring a neighbor down. Thefactorparameter derives the hello interval.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the time interval (in s), that LDP waits before a neighbor down. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the number of keepalive messages that should be sent on an idle LDP session in the hello timeout interval. Values-1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Default: Table 60 lists the default values.
				Table 60: 
			Hello Timeout Factors ContextTimeoutFactor
config>router>ldp>if-params153
config>router>ldp>targ-session453
config>router>ldp>if-params>ifInherits values from interface-parameters context.
config>router>ldp>targ-session>peerInherits values from targeted-session context.
